Net Access From Mobile Phones

05 Jul 1999

Worried about having to format pages for PDAs? It's getting worse. @Motion have announced a system which will allow mobile phones to access email, fax and the Web.

\nThe system will use text and text-to-voice for output, and HTML, XML and HDML for composition. @Motion are working on future developments including location-specific services such as restaurant reviews and directions to the nearest ATM.

\nSee the full story at TechWeb.
